snippet.title: Ghostrunner 2 - Official Dragon Pack DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the Ghostrunner 2 Dragon Pack DLC trailer. Ghostrunner 2 is a first-person combat platformer developed by One More Level. Ghostrunner 2 is celebrating the Year of the Dragon with all new content themed around the festivities including a Motorcycle skin, new Hand skins, new Sword skins, and more to enjoy as part of the season pass or to be purchased standalone. This update pack also includes a free update including a Chinese voice-over update for the game alongside an expansion of the current Roguerunner.exe Mode. The Ghostrunner 2 Dragon Pack and Free Chinese VO Update is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#Ghostrunner2 #Gaming #GameTrailers
